Class RecursiveBlobs

java.lang.Object
  RecursiveBlobs

public class RecursiveBlobs
extends java.lang.Object

Reads in a 2D array of characters from a text file (blobdata.txt), prints the array, counts the number of "blobs" and prints the total, replaces any asterisks with an "X" and the reprints the array

Version:
December 2, 2016
Author:
Matthew Pigliavento

Processes a 2D char array, replacing any asterisks with an X, and counting "blobs"
